com.koalog.util.cmdline
Class GUICommandLineParser

java.lang.Object
  com.koalog.util.cmdline.CommandLineParser
      com.koalog.util.cmdline.DefaultCommandLineParser
          com.koalog.util.cmdline.GUICommandLineParser
public class GUICommandLineParser
extends DefaultCommandLineParser

Default command line parser for GUI applications.

Understands the options:

  • -w (--working DIRECTORY) where DIRECTORY is a DIRECTORY.
in addition of the options understood by DefaultCommandLineParser.
